H0.text: Which river runs through the cities of Basel, Strasbourg, Karlsruhe, Mainz, Koblenz, Bonn, Cologne, Dsseldorf, Arnhem, Utrecht and Rotterdam. Rhone

A5.text: The Rhine enters the Netherlands near Arnhem and flows through Rotterdam as part of the Rhine-Meuse-Scheldt delta.
